## Mapping

## Task 1 
Install bwa from here: https://github.com/lh3/bwa

## Task 2
Create the index for our reference. It is located here: `/opt/data/reference/`

## Task 3
Execute paired-end alignment. Files are located here: `/opt/data/fastq`
Command should look something like this:
`bwa mem /opt/data/reference/kiv2_6.fasta <file1> <file2> |  gzip -3 > aln-pe.sam.gz`

## Task 4 
Convert output to BAM file format
`samtools view -Sb aln-pe.sam.gz > out.bam`

## Task 5 
Execute `samtools view and samtools sort`
